body_html:
@ASDen can you provide a gist with the entire traceback?

On Mon, Aug 1, 2016 at 9:59 PM, Anatoly Vostryakov <notifications@github.com

wrote:

@wchan https://github.com/wchan "There's a bug atm that it only runs on
CPU.... fix coming soon!"

It doesn't work with Adam or Momentum Optimizer on CPU too. The same error
as @ASDen https://github.com/ASDen said above. Is it supposed to work
with optimizers?

—
